DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of administration of AFQ056 in combination with L-dopa, in reducing the number of L-dopa related dyskinesias in Parkinson's disease patients.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of AFQ056 in Reducing L-dopa Induced Dyskinesias in Parkinson's Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with Parkinson's Disease Patients with Ldopa induced dyskinesia for at least 3 months Patients with Ldopa treatment for at least 3 years, stable for 1 month minimum History of severe allergy to food or drugs Very low or high body weight. Prior surgery for Parkinson's Disease Smokers Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
